name: Closers: Premium Starter Pack
detailed_description:
Ready to dive into the world of Closers? This pack contains gear, elite status, costumes, and more! (The Premium Starter Pack is limited to one per account.)

The Premium Starter Pack contains:

  • Small Plum Soda x 3—Remove 150 Fatigue and get back in the action!
  • Elite Status Voucher (30 Day)—Get the most out of Closers with a month of elite status!
  • White Fox Accessory Set Box—Contains the Snow Fox Tail, Ears, and Anklet 1-star costume pieces!
  • +10 Gear Boost—Enhance your key gear to +10 in one go!
  • +11 Gear Boost—And this one goes to 11!
  • Resurrection Capsule—If you fall down, get back up again!
about_the_game:
Ready to dive into the world of Closers? This pack contains gear, elite status, costumes, and more! (The Premium Starter Pack is limited to one per account.)

short_description:
The Premium Starter Pack contains everything you’re likely to want or need in your first month of playing Closers, including:

  • Small Plum Soda
  • Elite Status Voucher (30 Day)
  • White Fox Accessory Set Box
  • +10 Gear Boost
  • +11 Gear Boost
  • Resurrection Capsule

(Limit 1 per account)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 7600
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 8000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
